name: SCNPhysicsSliderJoint
desc: A physics behavior that connects two bodies and allows them to slide against each other and rotate around their connecting points.

items.name: init(bodyA: SCNPhysicsBody, axisA: SCNVector3, anchorA: SCNVector3, bodyB: SCNPhysicsBody, axisB: SCNVector3, anchorB: SCNVector3)
items.desc: Creates a slider joint connecting two physics bodies.

items.name: init(body: SCNPhysicsBody, axis: SCNVector3, anchor: SCNVector3)
items.desc: Creates a slider joint that anchors a single physics body in space and allows it to slide along a specific axis.

items.name: var bodyA: SCNPhysicsBody
items.desc: The first physics body connected by the joint.

items.name: var axisA: SCNVector3
items.desc: The axis along which the first body can slide, relative to the node containing it.

items.name: var anchorA: SCNVector3
items.desc: The point at which the joint connects, relative to the node containing the first body.

items.name: var bodyB: SCNPhysicsBody?
items.desc: The second physics body connected by the joint.

items.name: var axisB: SCNVector3
items.desc: The axis along which the second body can slide, relative to the node containing it.

items.name: var anchorB: SCNVector3
items.desc: The point at which the joint connects, relative to the node containing the second body.

items.name: var minimumLinearLimit: CGFloat
items.desc: The minimum distance between the anchor points of the two bodies, relative to their initial positions.

items.name: var maximumLinearLimit: CGFloat
items.desc: The maximum distance between the anchor points of the two bodies, relative to their initial positions.

items.name: var minimumAngularLimit: CGFloat
items.desc: The minimum rotation angle between the two bodies, measured in radians relative to their initial orientations.

items.name: var maximumAngularLimit: CGFloat
items.desc: The maximum rotation angle between the two bodies, measured in radians relative to their initial orientations.

items.name: var motorTargetLinearVelocity: CGFloat
items.desc: The velocity at which the joint’s connected bodies should slide.

items.name: var motorMaximumForce: CGFloat
items.desc: The maximum linear force that the joint can apply to its connected bodies, in newtons.

items.name: var motorTargetAngularVelocity: CGFloat
items.desc: The angular velocity at which the joint’s connected bodies should rotate around it.

items.name: var motorMaximumTorque: CGFloat
items.desc: The maximum torque that the joint can apply to its connected bodies, in newton-meters.
